review:
I'm a big fan of Overwatch smut since the day it released back in the halcyon days of 2016. And I'm a big fan of Westerns, so I'm a big fan of McCree too. 

I've followed cosplays. I've followed fan animations. Read fanfictions. I can finally play the game. 
 
All of those hours watching Overwatch's female heroes - Dva, Mei, Mercy, Widowmaker, and more - getting obliterated every which way possible was worth it. Seeing every fluid simulation, every pixel and polygon of sweat, just to make the Hydnora Africana for each animation and Blender render was worth it. The years since then have paid off for this moment, where I finally play the game and leave in about an hour's time because of horrendous rubberbanding. I won't forget the manhours I put in just waiting for each and every update on smut's evolution thanks to Overwatch and Blizzard.

This game deserve's every bit of hate and criticism it gets

playing this game is terrible, winning doesn't feel rewarding at all but makes you feel worse instead, everyone you meet is constantly bitching and moaning about the game, the competitive mode is a joke, 20$ for one skin is a spit in the face of the community, 3 whole arse years just to be told "oh pve isn't really happening as you expected oops guys give us 15$ thanks", remember the sexual harassment lawsuit, 

the characters at this point are an empty shall of what they once were, don't worry guys we got a new overpowered here who is a relatable person with a backstory and motive so basic and plain it gives Genshin impact 1.0 a run for its money

also using the lgbtq to get away from your controversies is pretty cringe
i felt better playing overwatch 1, i strongly miss the fun i had in that game
Ğ•ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ‚ĞµĞ¿ĞµÑ€ÑŒ ÑĞ¼Ñ‹ÑĞ» ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ° Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² Ğ½ĞµĞµ)
Release on Steam? A pathetic and desperate move in an attempt to salvage as much as possible from this wreck of a re-released game. Shame. You deserve every bit of the negative criticism, Blizzard.

You'd be better off spending your money on all the creators that make p*rn of this game than giving it to Blizzard. 
Go play Team Fortress 2. It's better.

The rare achievement list is full of things that are so common which says a lot. Most of these reviews are BS people who don't even play the game but hate blizzard. That being said OW2 is not perfect but the core game play is still 1 of a kind. There's a lot of eh changes from OW1 to OW2 but people don't talk about the actual problems. Most the reviews only talk about the monetization which isn't great but its almost all cosmetic only... these people are angry they don't still get multiple new skins for free every 2-3 months like OW1 did. OW1 system of loot boxes provided no money income so they made content that didn't = money. If you cant realize that the OW1 model was flawed and losing blizzard an insane amount of money you're simply dense. You still get free heros, maps, some cosmetics, patch notes, and new game modes pretty often. People crying about skins just want everything free in a free game. no free game will do that. Complain about the real problems with OW2/Blizzard not the basics of the video game business...
